info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 09 at 12:44PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Berkshire County through 115 PM EDT... At 1243 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sandisfield, or 12 miles east of Great Barrington, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Becket, Otis, Sandisfield, East Windsor, New Marlborough, South Sandisfield, Otis Wood Lanes, Konkapot, New Boston, Algerie Four Corners, Bonny Rigg Corners, North Otis, Montville, Free Quarter, Roosterville, Hephzibah Heights, Becket Center, Southfield, West New Boston and West Becket. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
